primary skills: (formula differs for monks, rogues dual wield, double

(level + 1) x 5

secondary skills:
(level + 1) x 3

<snip>

be 45. As of now, I think I have trained 2 points into Evocation at level 1
and or 2. This would give me a skill of 3 or 4 right now at level 4. I still
have 10 training points to spend. At 8th I will have 20 more points (if I
don't spend them on something else) for a total of 30.
My questionwas meant to read:

it up over more than one level? e.g. Train once at 8th: 30 points into
Evocation
